title: Learn from essential business data during the Pre-Black Friday Sale
content:
Information is the currency that gets successful businesses off the ground and keeps them in the air. Get access to thousands of case studies, courses, and more with Starter Story – Business Case Studies & Stories: Lifetime Subscription. For a limited time, Starter Story is only $84.99 if you use code SAVE15NOV for 15% off during the Pre-Black Friday Sale. 

With this lifetime subscription, you’ll get unlimited access to a massive archive of information, courses, skills, and more. You’ll be able to look through 3,500+ founder case studies to base your own business practices on. You can peruse Starter Story’s personal database of 5,000+ business ideas and data points, including information on market size, revenue, cost, and other information you need to consider to get your business running. 

You’ll even be able to analyze Starter Story’s marketing data and base your own marketing off 200+ tactics that will be free with your subscription. Naturally, you can also filter all of this data to find only what you need most. 

Get Starter Story – Business Case Studies & Stories: Lifetime Subscription for $84.99 (reg. $99.99) if you use code SAVE15NOV during the Pre-Black Friday Sale. 

Prices subject to change.
author: DealPost Team
